creator: michael.block@firstdata.com
text:
When redeploying an app by copying the WAR file to the webapps directory on a running tomcat, tomcat will delete the application's context file and then fail to start the application.

tomcat 5 never had such an issue.

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
Not sure what you are doing but the only way that will happen is if you delete the old war before you copy across the new one.

Please use the users list if you require further assistance.
